name: Robot Car Extreme Epic Multiplayer Simulator Game
name_original: Robot Car Extreme Epic Multiplayer Simulator Game
description:
Robot Car Extreme Takes you on a adrenaline-filled robot car experience.
Do you like robot car transforming games ? Maybe muscle car simulators? This game is best for you!
You are the driver of a cutting-edge transforming robot car.Transform your car into a robot, defeat enemies and save the humanity and be the hero of this epic world.

if you're excited to futuristic car games and robot games you will enjoy playing Robot Car Extreme

- Take control of an intelligent mech robot
- X ray weapon with unlimited ammo
- Realistic Transformations
- Dynamic Robot Combat skills
- Stunning Car Physics
- 24 challenging game missions.
- Realistic environment.
- Beautiful landscapes
- 3 different camera view

Truck robot, muscle robot, Car Robot, Sports Car Robot requires in-app purchase.
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
